main: ^Brokkr: I managed to do an upgrade on the sword.

^Scryer: Good. Before you leave, I want to know how the weapon hunt is going, also should you fail, I can get started on another plan of mine. Pick up the rock just next to you. If you talk into it, we will be able to communicate no matter where you are.
^Scryer: Take this enchanted stone, it will allow me to track and communicate with you. Unfortunately, you won't be able to answer back.
^Brokkr: I’m not falling for that again.
^Scryer: I never do a prank twice! It works, promise.
^Brokkr: … Very well, but why do you have to go?
^Scryer: Can’t stand around all day waiting for you, can I? Now go on, get those artifacts!
